title: Incorrect Handling of Source Attachment Changes for JAR Files
description: This bug report addresses the incorrect handling of source attachment changes for JAR files.
OB: Currently, when changing the attached source of a JAR file, a FSOURCEDETACHED java delta is fired instead of the expected (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta. As a result, the user interface (UI) reacts by closing the class file editors that were opened for this JAR file.
EB: The expected behavior is that when changing the attached source of a JAR file, a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta should be fired to accurately represent this change. This should trigger the UI to react appropriately without closing class file editors.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Build the system using version 20020416. 2) Change the attached source of a JAR file. You will observe that a FSOURCEDETACHED delta is fired, causing the UI to incorrectly close class file editors. Although attempting to fix the delta to be (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED), the UI does not respond as expected.
